name: Legion Health
headline: World-class, AI-enabled psychiatry covered by insurance
description: Legion Health is a high-quality, AI-enabled psychiatry network where patients receive care from a provider who takes their insurance. We use LLMs and AI agents to improve care quality, streamline operations, enhance patient communications, and more.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:health-tech; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:mental-health; location:austin

founders.name: Yash Patel, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Legion Health (YC S21)

founders.name: Daniel Wilson, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder, CTO at Legion Health

Builder, optimizer, and dreamer. Former Microsoft Excel PM.

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/098aed_c51cdfb66f2543ea876678e579534057f000.jpg/v1/fill/w_1080,h_613,al_c,q_85,usm_0.33_1.00_0.00,enc_avif,quality_auto/098aed_c51cdfb66f2543ea876678e579534057f000.jpg)
## World class psychiatry covered by your insurance.
Schedule today with a Board-Certified provider and take a leap forward in your mental health.
[Get started](https://legionhealth.com/<https:/lgn.to/step1-website1>)
![bcbs.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_b62b7f6ec77746a2a27a327dc5c75130~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_125,h_25,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/bcbs.png)
![uhg.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_e6725601ad214dbf9c5d6ec0c49e858e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_115,h_35,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/uhg.png)
![aetna.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_0f14c4cbaf184d5796fca7faca266b1b~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_105,h_60,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/aetna.png)
![anthem.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_71b9204e2e7b465ab245aa98e836a8b8~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_105,h_60,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/anthem.png)
![cigna.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_b08ac71dabbf491ba20dcd7d3df9ad09~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_115,h_65,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/cigna.png)
## Our mission is to make world class psychiatric care available to everyone who needs it.
We are a team of board-certified providers, guided by the top psychiatric experts in the country. We're dedicated to helping you take control of your mental health.
![Dr. T.jpeg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_9cd54d14c9cc4dce83b780b69ed078b5~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_769,y_477,w_2708,h_3056/fill/w_180,h_256,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Dr_%20T.jpeg)
###### Madhukar Trivedi, MD
Psychiatric Advisor
Professor in Psychiatry and Chair of Mental Health, UT Southwestern
![Charlotte.jpeg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_b389eb5ee4bf45e9a8b8516318a9b760~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_0,y_22,w_320,h_362/fill/w_180,h_256,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Charlotte.jpeg)
###### Charlotte Coates, PMHNP-BC
Clinical Lead ​
NYU Rory Meyers College of Nursing
![JC_headshots-2.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_94c3263654d74fca8a5ccb34cd9a89c0~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_1407,y_584,w_2424,h_2735/fill/w_180,h_256,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/JC_headshots-2.jpg)
###### Jacqueline Champlain, MD
Collaborating Physician ​
Loyola University Chicago Stritch School of Medicine 
![Jeff_10-9-17_Ruud Photography_1_15 \(1\).jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_ba91cf931b2d4f2e96bfce4923094e46~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_593,y_453,w_2453,h_2764/fill/w_180,h_256,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Jeff_10-9-17_Ruud%20Photography_1_15%20\(1\).jpg)
###### Jeffrey Bayless, PMHNP-BC
Board-Certified Provider University of Texas at Austin
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/098aed_d1fdd263c96b46268e758023453cf3ae~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_147,h_90,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/098aed_d1fdd263c96b46268e758023453cf3ae~mv2.jpg)
## Your care journey with us will be affordable, transparent, and tailored to you.
![Frame 3 \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/8105fa_4b2cdaf3302b4754813c3c6127035ae6~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_75,h_75,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Frame%203%20\(1\).png)
#### Begin with ease
Book your first appointment now, and let our dedicated team guide you through the paperwork, insurance details, and connect you with the perfect provider.
![Frame 1 \(4\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/8105fa_03ea0c965a7046eb952650a4de43038c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_75,h_75,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Frame%201%20\(4\).png)
#### Continued support
Your provider will personalize a follow-up schedule to track your progress and manage prescriptions. Need more support? Extra appointments are just a call away.
![Frame 2 \(4\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/8105fa_00d173737dbf42ad90c559f5f2681075~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_75,h_75,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Frame%202%20\(4\).png)
#### Initial visit
Dive deep during your 1-hour initial visit, designed for comprehensive understanding, accurate, evidence-based diagnosis, and trust-building with your provider. 
# We treat you as more than a diagnosis.
## Psychiatry is just one part of a comprehensive approach to mental wellness. We'll coordinate with the other members of your care team (including primary care doctor, therapist, etc.) to give you the best possible outcome. All visits are completed on a secure telemedicine portal, so you can get care from the comfort of your home. 
## ​What we treat ​
  * ## ADHD
  * ## Anxiety disorders
  * ## Depression
  * ## Bipolar disorder
  * ## Borderline personality disorder
  * ## PTSD
  * ## OCD
  * ## Panic disorder
  * ## Insomnia/sleep disorders
  * ## Premenstrual dysphoric disorder


## Not covered at this time ​​
  * ## Alcohol or substance use disorders
  * ## Severe schizophrenia
  * ## Severe personality disorders
  * ## Ketamine/psychedelic treatments


[Get started](https://legionhealth.com/<https:/lgn.to/step1-website1>)
#### [Meet our providers](https://legionhealth.com/<https:/elasticthemes.com/>)
I believe in an evidence-based, collaborative approach where each client makes informed decisions on the course of their treatment. 
I also believe that successful treatment plans must include non-pharmacological interventions. I will work with each client’s strengths to determine which are most appropriate.
![Jeff_10-9-17_Ruud Photography_1_15 \(1\).jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/ceca9e_ba91cf931b2d4f2e96bfce4923094e46~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_0,y_0,w_3875,h_3812/fill/w_110,h_108,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Jeff_10-9-17_Ruud%20Photography_1_15%20\(1\).jpg)
#### [Jeffrey Bayless, PMHNP-BC](https://legionhealth.com/<https:/elasticthemes.com/>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2531ae_b65333e25e0c40c3b3c3341cee516a25~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_145,h_20,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/2531ae_b65333e25e0c40c3b3c3341cee516a25~mv2.png)
  1. [](https://legionhealth.com/<./#comp-lg3wxm11>)
  2. [](https://legionhealth.com/<./#comp-lg3wxm156>)


![legion-logo-text-dark-450-150.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/098aed_a25d6b7fadc64c17864b6b98ca6e421c~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_105,h_35,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/legion-logo-text-dark-450-150.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Legion Health**

**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Austin, TX  
**Team Size:** 9 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S21  
**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel  
**Website:** [legionhealth.com](https://legionhealth.com)  

### Mission
Legion Health is on a clear mission: to provide world-class, AI-enabled psychiatry that is accessible and covered by insurance. It's a bold vision in a space that desperately needs innovation. 

### What They Do
Starting as a high-quality psychiatry network, Legion Health integrates advanced AI and large language models (LLMs) to enhance patient care. This includes optimizing operations, improving communication with patients, and ensuring a holistic approach to mental health. Patients are paired with board-certified providers who accept their insurance, making access to mental health care easier and more affordable.

### Services
Legion Health offers a comprehensive range of mental health services, treating conditions such as:

- ADHD
- Anxiety disorders
- Depression
- Bipolar disorder
- Borderline personality disorder
- PTSD
- OCD
- Panic disorder
- Insomnia and sleep disorders
- Premenstrual dysphoric disorder

They focus on a personalized, collaborative treatment plan tailored to the individual, involving both pharmacological and non-pharmacological interventions. The initial consultation, which lasts an hour, is crucial for building a trusting relationship and ensuring an evidence-based diagnosis.

However, it's worth noting that they currently do not cover treatment for alcohol or substance use disorders, severe schizophrenia, severe personality disorders, or ketamine/psychedelic treatments.

### The Process
Legion Health has made accessing care straightforward. New patients can book appointments through their secure telemedicine portal, reflecting a commitment to privacy and convenience. The onboarding process is designed to guide patients through paperwork and insurance, ensuring that support is there at every step. Follow-up plans are also tailored to manage prescriptions and track progress.

### Team of Experts
The Legion team is composed of specialists led by experienced professionals, including Madhukar Trivedi, MD (Psychiatric Advisor), and others with prestigious affiliations, ensuring that patients receive top-notch care.

### Conclusion
In summary, Legion Health combines cutting-edge technology with compassionate care to bridge the gap in mental health services. The commitment to making psychiatric care accessible and insurance-covered is a game-changer. In an era where mental health is increasingly prioritized, Legion Health is positioning itself as a leader in the health-tech landscape, particularly in the realm of mental health. If you're looking for a forward-thinking approach to psychiatry, they could be worth exploring.
